analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xd7bfc66048f16aa9fe51564677f5d68a90ee8e82.sol:
	Contract ACTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xd7bfc66048f16aa9fe51564677f5d68a90ee8e82.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xd7bfc66048f16aa9fe51564677f5d68a90ee8e82.sol#72-73) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of ACTToken.BurnToken (/unique_chucks/15/0xd7bfc66048f16aa9fe51564677f5d68a90ee8e82.sol#198-199) is not in mixedCase
